method.name: POST
method.doc: Policy creation is not supported using the policies resource URI. To create a new policy use the Policy Editor on the appliance local management interface (LMI), the full JSON API or the duplicating an existing policy API.
On the local management interface, click Secure Access Control. Under Policy, select Access Control to get to the Policy Editor.
Please see "Duplicate a policy" to see how to create a policy from an existing policy or "Create a policy (Full JSON API)" to create a policy by defining the policy as a JSON object.
